AltName.entry: SOUTH YORKSHIRE FIRE SERVICE HISTORICAL SOCIETY

Desc.entry: A collection of fire engines, police vehicles, uniforms, photographs and equipment from around the world. Houses the Charlie Peace Exhibition. Has a children's play area and function room for children's parties. Rides for children on a fire engine. Special visits once per month by Fireman Sam. Group visits and school visits by appointment. Holds memorabilia sales April and October.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sundays and Bank Holiday weekends 11am-5pm (last entry 4pm), group visits at other times by appointment
